documentType: USCIS Form I-914 Supplement B (Declaration of Law Enforcement Officer for Victim of Trafficking)
summary: This is a U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services Form I-914 Supplement B, completed by the FBI, certifying an individual as a victim of a severe form of trafficking in persons. The applicant, a woman from Slovakia, was recruited and abused by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. She participated in the investigation and expressed fear of retaliation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Identified as the individual who recruited, harbored, and obtained the applicant for a coercive sexual relationship, forcing her into sex acts and causing physical injuries.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named alongside Epstein as a suspect/defendant in the criminal investigation. The applicant's participation in the investigation targeted both Epstein and Maxwell.

persons.name: Ms. Marcinko
persons.context: The applicant for the T-visa, a woman from Slovakia who was trafficked and abused by Epstein. She participated in the investigation, provided evidence of injuries, and expressed fear of retaliation.

connections.description: Named together as suspects/defendants in the criminal investigation for trafficking and abuse of the victim.
Epstein recruited, harbored, obtained, coerced, and forced the applicant into sex acts, causing her physical injuries.
Maxwell is implicated in the alleged criminal acts against the applicant, who participated in the investigation targeting Maxwell.

events.title: Investigation Initiated
events.description: The investigation or prosecution of the trafficking crimes was initiated.

events.title: Investigation Completed
events.description: The investigation or prosecution of the trafficking crimes was completed.

locations: 26 Federal Plaza, New York, NY 10278 (FBI office address)
keyFacts: A Slovakian woman, Ms. Marcinko, was certified as a victim of severe sex trafficking by the FBI.
The victim was recruited, harbored, and obtained by Jeffrey Epstein and others for a coercive sexual relationship.
The victim provided pictures of injuries sustained from physical abuse by Epstein.
The victim and her family in Slovakia received threats during her participation in the investigation of Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.
The victim participated in multiple meetings with investigators regarding alleged criminal activities by Epstein and Maxwell.
